price: আমি ইচ্ছা কৰিলে ইয়াক খেৰ-কুটাত পৰিণত কৰিব পাৰোঁ, তেতিয়া তোমালোকে হতাশ হৈ পৰিবা;
arabic: لَوۡ نَشَآءُ لَجَعَلۡنَٰهُ حُطَٰمٗا فَظَلۡتُمۡ تَفَكَّهُونَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: law nashāu lajaʿalnāhu ḥuṭāman faẓaltum tafakkahūna
